ns1:UpdateResourceFromWorkflowData.ResourceQuery: /csoEntitlement[ not(csoRecalculate='true') and ObjectID='[//Target/ObjectID]' and (not(/Person[ObjectID='[//Target/UserID]']/csoRoles = /csoEntitlement[ UserID='[//Target/UserID]' and (idmStartDate < op:add-dayTimeDuration-to-dateTime(fn:current-dateTime(), xs:dayTimeDuration('P1D'))) and ((idmEndDate > op:add-dayTimeDuration-to-dateTime(fn:current-dateTime(), xs:dayTimeDuration('P1D')))) ]/csoRoles) or not(/csoEntitlement[ UserID='[//Target/UserID]' and (idmStartDate < op:add-dayTimeDuration-to-dateTime(fn:current-dateTime(), xs:dayTimeDuration('P1D'))) and ((idmEndDate > op:add-dayTimeDuration-to-dateTime(fn:current-dateTime(), xs:dayTimeDuration('P1D')))) ]/csoRoles = /Person[ObjectID='[//Target/UserID]']/csoRoles)) ]
